TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BackgroundWorker extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 在单独的线程上执行操作。

span.span: Executes an operation on a separate thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您可以在单独的专用线程中运行操作。The class allows you to run an operation on a separate, dedicated thread. 耗时操作，例如下载和数据库的事务可能会导致用户界面 (UI) 来看起来就好像它已停止响应运行时。Time-consuming operations like downloads and database transactions can cause your user interface (UI) to seem as though it has stopped responding while they are running. 当你想响应式 UI 和您面对此类操作相关联的延迟时间很长类提供了一个方便的解决方案。When you want a responsive UI and you are faced with long delays associated with such operations, the class provides a convenient solution. 若要在后台执行耗时的操作，创建和侦听的事件在操作完成时报告的操作和信号的进度。To execute a time-consuming operation in the background, create a and listen for events that report the progress of your operation and signal when your operation is finished. 您可以创建以编程方式或将其拖到窗体从**组件**选项卡**工具箱**。You can create the programmatically or you can drag it onto your form from the **Components** tab of the **Toolbox**. 如果您创建在 Windows 窗体设计器中，它将出现在组件栏中，并将在属性窗口中显示其属性。If you create the in the Windows Forms Designer, it will appear in the Component Tray, and its properties will be displayed in the Properties window. 若要设置的后台操作，将添加的事件处理程序事件。To set up for a background operation, add an event handler for the event. 在此事件处理程序中调用耗时的操作。Call your time-consuming operation in this event handler. 若要开始操作，请调用。To start the operation, call . 若要接收进度更新的通知，处理事件。To receive notifications of progress updates, handle the event. 若要完成该操作时接收通知，处理事件。To receive a notification when the operation is completed, handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 您必须小心以免操作中的任何用户界面对象在事件处理程序。You must be careful not to manipulate any user-interface objects in your event handler. 相反，通信到通过用户界面和事件。Instead, communicate to the user interface through the and events. > > 跨不封送事件边界。 events are not marshaled across boundaries. 不要使用组件来执行多线程的操作中多个。Do not use a component to perform multithreaded operations in more than one . 如果后台操作需要的参数，调用时给出参数。If your background operation requires a parameter, call with your parameter. 内部事件处理程序，你可以提取参数从属性。Inside the event handler, you can extract the parameter from the property. 若要详细了解 ，请参阅[如何：在后台运行操作](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。For more information about , see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的基础知识类以异步方式执行耗时的操作。The following code example demonstrates the basics of the class for executing a time-consuming operation asynchronously. 下图显示输出的示例。The following illustration shows an example of the output. ![BackgroundWorker 简单示例](~/add/media/backgroundworker-simple.png "BackgroundWorker 简单示例")![BackgroundWorker simple example](~/add/media/backgroundworker-simple.png "BackgroundWorker simple example") 若要尝试此代码，创建 Windows 窗体应用程序。To try this code, create a Windows Forms application. 添加名为控件`resultLabel`并添加两个控件分别命名为`startAsyncButton`和`cancelAsyncButton`。Add a control named `resultLabel` and add two controls named `startAsyncButton` and `cancelAsyncButton`. 创建这两个按钮的事件处理程序。Create event handlers for both buttons. 从**组件**选项卡的工具箱中，添加组件名为`backgroundWorker1`。From the **Components** tab of the Toolbox, add a component named `backgroundWorker1`. 创建， ，并事件处理程序。Create , , and event handlers for the . 在窗体代码中，将现有代码替换为以下代码。In the code for the form, replace the existing code with the following code. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorkerSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.componentmodel.backgroundworkersimple/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorkerSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.componentmodel.backgroundworkersimple/vb/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将类以异步方式执行耗时的操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class for executing a time-consuming operation asynchronously. 下图显示输出的示例。The following illustration shows an example of the output. ![BackgroundWorker Fibonacci 示例](~/add/media/backgroundworker-fibonacci.png "BackgroundWorker Fibonacci 示例")![BackgroundWorker Fibonacci example](~/add/media/backgroundworker-fibonacci.png "BackgroundWorker Fibonacci example") 此操作计算所选的斐波那契数字、 报告进度更新计算继续进行，并允许取消挂起的计算。The operation computes the selected Fibonacci number, reports progress updates as the calculation proceeds, and permits a pending calculation to be canceled. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 请求取消挂起的后台操作。

span.span: Requests cancellation of a pending background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提交请求以终止挂起的后台操作，并设置属性设置为`true`。 submits a request to terminate the pending background operation and sets the property to `true`. 当您调用，辅助方法有机会停止其执行并退出。When you call , your worker method has an opportunity to stop its execution and exit. 辅助角色代码应定期检查属性以查看是否它已设置为`true`。The worker code should periodically check the property to see if it has been set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 请注意，中的代码事件处理程序可能会完成其工作，如正在发出取消请求，并轮询循环可能会错过设置为`true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在这种情况下，标志的在你事件处理程序不能设置为`true`，即使发出取消请求。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 这种情况称为*争用条件*和是多线程编程中的常见问题。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 有关多线程处理设计的详细信息的问题，请参见[Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法取消异步 （"后台"） 操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to cancel an asynchronous ("background") operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#4)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示应用程序是否已请求取消后台操作。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the application has requested cancellation of a background operation.

value.span: 如果应用程序已请求取消后台操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application has requested cancellation of a background operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，然后上调用方法。If is `true`, then the method has been called on the . 此属性旨在供工作线程，应定期检查中止在后台操作时设置为`true`。This property is meant for use by the worker thread, which should periodically check and abort the background operation when it is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置为查询的取消状态。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to query a about its cancellation state. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#8)]

Public Custom Event DoWork As DoWorkEventHandler

span.span: Occurs when is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用时，将引发此事件方法。This event is raised when you call the method. 这是执行可能很耗时的工作的操作的开始位置。This is where you start the operation that performs the potentially time-consuming work. 中的代码事件处理程序应定期检查属性值和中止该操作，如果它是`true`。Your code in the event handler should periodically check the property value and abort the operation if it is `true`. 当发生这种情况时，您可以设置标志的到`true`，和的标志中你事件处理程序将设置为`true`。When this occurs, you can set the flag of to `true`, and the flag of in your event handler will be set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 请注意，中的代码事件处理程序可能会完成其工作，如正在发出取消请求，并轮询循环可能会错过设置为`true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在这种情况下，标志的在你事件处理程序不能设置为`true`，即使发出取消请求。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 这种情况称为*争用条件*和是多线程编程中的常见问题。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 有关多线程处理设计的详细信息的问题，请参见[Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md). 如果您的操作生成的结果，您可以将结果分配给属性。If your operation produces a result, you can assign the result to the property. 这将可供中的事件处理程序属性。This will be available to the event handler in the property. 如果该操作会引发异常无法处理你的代码，捕获异常并将其传递到事件处理程序，其中公开作为属性的。If the operation raises an exception that your code does not handle, the catches the exception and passes it into the event handler, where it is exposed as the property of . 如果在 Visual Studio 调试器下运行，调试器会在中的点处中断未经处理的异常引发的事件处理程序。If you are running under the Visual Studio debugger, the debugger will break at the point in the event handler where the unhandled exception was raised. 如果有多个，你应不其中任何一个直接引用，因为这会耦合你事件处理程序的特定实例。If you have more than one , you should not reference any of them directly, as this would couple your event handler to a specific instance of . 相反，应访问你通过强制转换`sender`中的参数在事件处理程序。Instead, you should access your by casting the `sender` parameter in your event handler. 您必须小心以免操作中的任何用户界面对象在事件处理程序。You must be careful not to manipulate any user-interface objects in your event handler. 相反，通信的用户界面通过事件。Instead, communicate to the user interface through the events. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将事件启动异步操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to start an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时将启动异步操作。The starts an asynchronous operation when you call . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为等待完成的操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to wait for completion of a operation. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例中所述[如何： 下载在后台文件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md)。This code example is part of a larger example described in [How to: Download a File in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来报告异步操作的进度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#24)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你需要报告其进度的后台操作，则可以调用方法来引发事件。If you need the background operation to report on its progress, you can call the method to raise the event. 属性值必须是`true`，或将引发。The property value must be `true`, or will throw an . 它是任务的由您来实现的总已完成的百分比测量后台操作的进度有意义的方式。It is up to you to implement a meaningful way of measuring your background operation's progress as a percentage of the total task completed. 对调用方法是异步的将立即返回。The call to the method is asynchronous and returns immediately. 事件处理程序创建的线程上执行。The event handler executes on the thread that created the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来报告给用户的异步操作的进度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation to the user. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RunWorkerAsync() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Starts execution of a background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提交请求以启动操作以异步方式运行。The method submits a request to start the operation running asynchronously. 当处理请求时，引发事件，随后开始执行后台操作。When the request is serviced, the event is raised, which in turn starts execution of your background operation. 如果后台操作已在运行，则调用再次将引发。If the background operation is already running, calling again will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来启动异步操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to start an asynchronous operation. 它是一个更大的示例中所述的一部分[如何： 下载在后台文件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md)。It is part of a larger example described in [How to: Download a File in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RunWorkerAsync(object argument) cil managed

param.name: argument
param.span: 要在 事件处理程序中执行的后台操作使用的参数。

span.span: A parameter for use by the background operation to be executed in the event handler.
Starts execution of a background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提交请求以启动操作以异步方式运行。The method submits a request to start the operation running asynchronously. 当处理请求时，引发事件，随后开始执行后台操作。When the request is serviced, the event is raised, which in turn starts execution of your background operation. 如果您的操作需要一个参数，则可以提供其作为`argument`参数。If your operation requires a parameter, you can provide it as the `argument` parameter to . 如果后台操作已在运行，则调用再次将引发。If the background operation is already running, calling again will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来启动异步操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to start an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#3)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RunWorkerCompleted As RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 当后台操作已完成、被取消或引发异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the background operation has completed, has been canceled, or has raised an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件时事件处理程序返回。This event is raised when the event handler returns. 如果操作成功完成，其结果分配事件处理程序，可以访问通过结果属性。If the operation completes successfully and its result is assigned in the event handler, you can access the result through the property. 属性的指示由操作引发了异常。The property of indicates that an exception was thrown by the operation. 属性的指示是否取消请求已处理的后台操作。The property of indicates whether a cancellation request was processed by the background operation. 如果中的代码事件处理程序通过检查来检测取消请求标志并设置标记到`true`，则标志的还将设置为`true`.If your code in the event handler detects a cancellation request by checking the flag and setting the flag of to `true`, the flag of also will be set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 请注意，中的代码事件处理程序可能会完成其工作，如正在发出取消请求，并轮询循环可能会错过设置为`true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在这种情况下，标志的在你事件处理程序不能设置为`true`，即使发出取消请求。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 这种情况称为*争用条件*和是多线程编程中的常见问题。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 有关多线程处理设计的详细信息的问题，请参见[Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](~/docs/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices.md). 你事件处理程序应始终检查并属性，然后才能访问属性。Your event handler should always check the and properties before accessing the property. 如果引发了异常，或者如果该操作已取消，访问属性引发异常。If an exception was raised or if the operation was canceled, accessing the property raises an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将事件以处理异步操作的结果。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to handle the result of an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 能否报告进度更新。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the can report progress updates.

value.span: 如果 支持进度更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the supports progress updates; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`如果你想以支持进度更新。Set the property to `true` if you want the to support progress updates. 当此属性是`true`，用户代码可以调用方法来引发事件。When this property is `true`, user code can call the method to raise the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否支持异步取消。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the supports asynchronous cancellation.

value.span: 如果 支持取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the supports cancellation; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`如果你想支持取消。Set the property to `true` if you want the to support cancellation. 当此属性是`true`，可以调用中断后台操作的方法。When this property is `true`, you can call the method to interrupt a background operation.
